snippet: Tattoos are popular among people of marrying age, but some brides, for various reasons, want to cover them up on their wedding day.
abstract: Some brides, whether for reasons of aesthetics, religion or family harmony, are covering up their tattoos on their wedding day; description of several techniques, including  cosmetics or permanent lasers, that can hide or remove tattoos described.
lead_paragraph: Tattoos are popular among people of marrying age, but some brides, for various reasons, want to cover them up on their wedding day.

headline.seo: Many Brides Choosing to Hide Their Tattoos
headline.main: Something Borrowed, but Not Something Blue
headline.print_headline: Something Borrowed, But Not Something Blue

keywords.value: Laser (Light Amplification by Stimulated Emission of Radiation)
keywords.name: subject
